LanguageData.HUA_Bullet_AdvancedAssaultRifle.label: advanced rifle bullet
LanguageData.HUA_Bullet_AdvancedBattleRifle.label: advanced rifle bullet
LanguageData.HUA_Bullet_AdvancedDMR.label: advanced rifle bullet
LanguageData.HUA_Bullet_AdvancedMagnum.label: advanced bullet
LanguageData.HUA_Bullet_AdvancedShotgun.label: advanced shotgun blast
LanguageData.HUA_Bullet_AdvancedSniperRifle.label: sniper rifle bullet
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedAssaultRifle.label: advanced assault rifle
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedAssaultRifle.description: An advanced gas-operated assault rifle for urban and boarding combat. What it lacks in accuracy, it makes up with damage and bullets fired.
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedBattleRifle.label: advanced battle rifle
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedBattleRifle.description: An advanced battle rifle shooting three bullet bursts. It has good range, damage and armour penetration.
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedDMR.label: advanced marksman rifle
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedDMR.description: An advanced marksman rifle shooting with exceptionally long range, great accuracy and good power. It files both the role of a combat and sniper rifle.
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedDMR.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedDMR.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedDMR.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedMagnum.label: advanced pistol
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedMagnum.description: An advanced blowback-operated self-loading pistol. It lacks stopping power and range, but does a high amount of damage.
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedMagnum.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedShotgun.label: advanced shotgun
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedShotgun.description: An automatic advanced shotgun. It is even shorter-ranged than a typical shotgun, but is extraordinarily dangerous due to its damage output.
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedSniperRifle.label: advanced sniper rifle
LanguageData.HUA_Gun_AdvancedSniperRifle.description: An advanced, gas-operated design of precision sniper rifle. It has an exceptionally long range, great accuracy and extreme power.
